#include<stdio.h>
 
int main()
{
    char str[1000],ch,key[]={0,'V','X','S','W','D','F','G','U','H','J','K','N','B','I','O',0,'E','A','R','Y','C','Q','Z','T',0};
    int i=0;
    while(((ch=getchar())!=EOF)&&(ch!='\n'))
    {
       if(ch>='a' && ch<='z')
        {
        	ch=key[ch-97];
        	if(ch!=0)
        	{
        	ch+=32;
        	putchar(ch);
        	}
        }
       else if(ch>='A' && ch<='Z')
        {
        	ch=key[ch-65];
        	if(ch!=0)  putchar(ch);
        }
 
      
    }
      printf("\n");
    return 0;
}
